# test install and use Hello Word Applet operation
# card is JCOP 21
# security level is NO_SECURITY_LEVEL
#

# Select GP and Authentification step
00 A4 04 00 08 A0 00 00 00 03 00 00 00
6F 65 84 08 A0 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 A5 59 9F 65 01 FF 9F 6E 06 40 51 63 45 29 00 73 4A 06 07 2A 86 48 86 FC 6B 01 60 0C 06 0A 2A 86 48 86 FC 6B 02 02 01 01 63 09 06 07 2A 86 48 86 FC 6B 03 64 0B 06 09 2A 86 48 86 FC 6B 04 02 15 65 0B 06 09 2B 85 10 86 48 64 02 01 03 66 0C 06 0A 2B 06 01 04 01 2A 02 6E 01 02 90 00
80 50 00 00 08 A2 12 53 16 08 C9 8D 05
00 00 81 58 06 54 71 91 38 23 FF 02 00 8F 90 9B 81 14 22 F7 A9 35 1F 76 6A 09 20 CA 90 00
84 82 00 00 10 70 B5 A1 A2 16 92 AA 6B 93 55 DF AF B7 71 64 36
90 00

# Install Hello World Applet

# Select Hello World Applet ...
00 A4 04 00 0A A0 00 00 00 62 03 01 0C 01 01
00 A4 04 00 0A A0 00 00 00 62 03 01 0C 01 01 90 00
# ... and Say "Hello"
00 00 00 00 05 48 45 4C 4C 4F
00 00 00 00 05 48 45 4C 4C 4F 90 00

# Select GP and Delete Applet
00 A4 04 00 08 A0 00 00 00 03 00 00 00
6F 65 84 08 A0 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 A5 59 9F 65 01 FF 9F 6E 06 40 51 63 45 29 00 73 4A 06 07 2A 86 48 86 FC 6B 01 60 0C 06 0A 2A 86 48 86 FC 6B 02 02 01 01 63 09 06 07 2A 86 48 86 FC 6B 03 64 0B 06 09 2A 86 48 86 FC 6B 04 02 15 65 0B 06 09 2B 85 10 86 48 64 02 01 03 66 0C 06 0A 2B 06 01 04 01 2A 02 6E 01 02 90 00
